channel.title: Games - Dandy Dino Studio
channel.description: Recent content in Games on Dandy Dino Studio

item.title: Joe's Wrath
item.description: After being mistakenly kidnapped by the Russian mob, Joe swears vengeance on those who had wronged him. It's up to you to help Joe fight through hordes of enemies on a killing spree he never thought he'd be part of (the main part).

item.title: Black And White Dimensions
item.description: Black And White Dimensions is a mobile game where your spaceship has been caught in a gravitational anomaly, causing it to travel between the Black and White dimensions!
